lead_paragraph: Texas Tech could be playing this season without Jarrett Hicks, its top receiver. An N.C.A.A. ruling denied a waiver for Hicks’s academic eligibility. Hicks, a senior, led the Big 12 in catches per game last season. No. 25 Texas Tech, which opens its season tomorrow at home against Southern Methodist, has appealed the eligibility denial.
